resources.string: "A few Frames Skipping (Processing may become slow)"
The target of this game is erasing all the blocks on the stage.
If a direction button is pushed, Nekoman will move in the direction.
"If you swipe vertically on the right half of a screen, Camera's height will be changed."
"If you swipe horizontally on the right half of a screen, Camera's viewpoint will be changed."
If 2 or more Green Block is connected vertically or horizontally, it will disappear.
Red Block: 3 or more, Blue Block: 4 or more, Yellow Block: 5 or more.
This game is fairly difficult contrary to the loveliness of Nekoman.
